attributes.action: The NHS should only be free to those who have paid over £5,000 in taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many foreigners are retiring to Britain and have never paid a penny into the tax system yet they get free NHS treatment also lazy Britains who sit on the dole. I think only taxpayers who have paid £5,000 minimum in taxes should get free NHS - those who have never paid in to the system should be charged for the treatment they receive.
